nodes.text: A hilt-masking kit was a lightsaber attachment that was used to disguise the saber as another item. The price of a kit varied depending on which item the modified saber was designed to resemble.
Hilt-masking kits were mentioned in Gadgets and Gear, a roleplaying supplementary sourcebook for the Star Wars Roleplaying series that was published by Fantasy Flight Games in 2019.
